prompt: Check my calendar for overlapping meetings today. If found, reschedule the internal one (e.g., 'Team Sync') to 1 hour later and email the participants about the change.
gold_response: Identified overlapping meetings, rescheduled 'Team Sync', and notified participants.

rubric.criteria: The agent must identify overlapping meetings on the calendar for today.
The agent must reschedule the internal meeting ('Team Sync') to 1 hour later.
The agent must send an email to the participants of the rescheduled meeting.
